hero.title: Hello, I am Mariano Hilario
hero.subtitle: Fullstack developer and operational leader based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
hero.text: Web fullstack developer with over 20 years of experience in operational leadership. Passionate about combining technical and organizational knowledge to design innovative and efficient solutions. Always seeking new challenges that allow me to grow and add value.

about.subtitle: Career Summary
about.text: For over 20 years, I have coordinated multidisciplinary teams and optimized processes in large organizations. This experience has provided me with a solid foundation in problem-solving and quick decision-making skills, which I now apply to software development to deliver functional and scalable solutions.
about.third-job-title: Head of Management Control and Processes at

skills.subtitle: Experience in multiple projects and technologies
skills.text:
Frontend Development I have experience creating modern and interactive user interfaces using current technologies and tools that allow me to build fast, efficient, and responsive web applications.

Backend Development I specialize in developing robust and efficient servers, ensuring that business logic and data manipulation work seamlessly.

Testing and Quality I strive to deliver high-quality code, using best testing practices to ensure that the software works as expected at all times.

DevOps I use Git, GitHub, and Docker to maintain an efficient workflow and high productivity in software development.

Soft Skills In addition to my technical skills, I have over 20 years of experience in operational leadership, which allows me to have a global and strategic view in decision-making, as well as in coordinating projects and teams.
